title: MacOS Sierra?
body: I really want to update to OS Sierra, but Im scared league will not work or it'll glitch out really bad. I checked a thread already about this that was posted a while ago and it seemed like a lot of people were having problems with league after updating and the Rioter reply to that was posted a while ago as well. So is there any update on this? Should it work normally now that its been out for a bit? Or will it still be glitchy?  O_O

replies.body:
There are a few bugs we're tracking on [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bJx6P0hX-known-bugs-in-macos-1012-sierra) that are mostly related to weird interactions with click+dragging with macOS Sierra. Some other players have reported FPS issues after upgrading, but this has yet to be confirmed that it's related to Sierra or not.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
after updating my mouse been acting up sporadically only fix is to turn off the software thing and its kind of cancer without it

Still glitchy. Riot Games should just fire whoever is making these ports to OS X. Other games haven't been patched for years and they don't get retarded bugs like this whenever there is a new OS X version.  Also the in-game performance is half of what used to be a year ago.
Does anyone have any updates on the status of League and OS Sierra? This is literally the only thing stopping me from upgrading and I'm curious if they've ever fixed it
